item.title: How to write unit tests in the Go programming language?
item.description: Why should you write tests? Programming is not an easy task, write test is neither, but part of the software development process is writing tests. Testing our code is a good way to ensure quality and improve reliability, Introducing Go, 2016. When we talk about testing, we’re implicitly referring to automated testing, it’s the practice of writing small programs that check that code behaves as expected for defined entries, The Go Programming Language, 2016]book-the-go-programming-language.

item.title: About
item.description: When I was a Computer Science graduate I was able to work with academic research in the field of Computer Vision, and in Digital Identity Management. The Laboratory’s partnerships with companies and government institutions made the results of the research accessible to industry and government. At Cheesecake Labs, where I had the opportunity to work with several people from all over the world, the process of creating projects with these clients was incredible.

item.title: Contact
item.description: If you have something you would like to say to me, be sure to get in touch, comments on this site, ideas for new projects, a conversation is always an opportunity for growth. You can get in touch via Twitter, Linkedin or Telegram, feel free.
